parts.text: I need a
phone
plan that is more affordable. Please help.
Any cheaper options that you could make me aware of?
Do you have another cheaper plan for my phone?
May I get a cheaper phone plan?
How do I make sure my phone gets a reduced bill?
I want reduced phone bills each month and I am looking.
I want a plan that is cheaper since I don’t need all the services.
This plan doesn’t suit my needs and it’s expensive. Do you have a cheaper plan?
What other plans are available that are cheaper?
Could you help me get a cheaper plan?
I would like you to search for other plans with less monthly bill.
I want to get details of other cheaper options.
is
this
the cheaper plan you have?
that is the cheapest plan you have?
are there no cheaper plans than that?
Are these the available options? Do I have anything cheaper?
Could you get me a less expensive option?
What other cheap options do I have?
Is there a cheaper option?
I did not like either of these options. Are there any other cheaper plans?
Are there other cheap plans?
Do you have any other cheaper choices?
Are there other more affordable options?
What are the other affordable plans?
Are there any cheaper options?
Is there anything cheaper?
Do you have anything more affordable?
I am wondering if I could reduce my monthly bill amount by getting into a different plan.
How to get a cheaper monthly bill?
